# www.robotstxt.org/
# Prevent browsing and automated scraping
User-agent: *
Disallow: /

# If you wish to allow specific bots or paths, override above.
# Example: allow googlebot to access /assets for images
# User-agent: Googlebot
# Allow: /assets/

# Sitemap reference
Sitemap: https://lyszt.net/sitemap.xml
